channel.title: Modding leveling. *request*
channel.description: I'm new to coding, but I'm trying to find out how to make it so the leveling isn't as fast as it is in my server at the moment.

item.title: Modding leveling. *request*
item.dc:creator: @syanara syanara
item.description:
@syanara wrote:

Yeah, thank you. I’m going to start trying to look 4 more seconds before I try and write. lol. I found that right after i posted. but thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Modding leveling. *request*
item.dc:creator: @Jamie14 Jamie14
item.description:
@Jamie14 wrote:

Syan thats quite easy:P

Go into your client.java and search

addSkillXp

you should get something similar to this addSkillXP((5 * playerLevel[19]), 19);

The 5 is the xp it gives atm.

so if you wanted to lower the training of str

                    } else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled
                    {
                        TotalExp = (double) (700 * hitDiff);
                        TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);

You would change the 700 in there to lower than it is and save compile yourdone

Read full topic
